data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

requestBody.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Expired package with unused sessions". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Minor Protection + Guardian Approval. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.
